alien4cloud.security

Interface ISecurityEnabledResource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSecurityEnabledResource

    public interface ISecurityEnabledResource
    This is temporary to differentiate with ISecuredResource. An ISecurityEnabledResource is a secured resource, only authorized subjects have access to the resource.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String APPLICATION 
      static String ENVIRONMENT 
      static String GROUP 
      static String USER
